## Cleaning 

```{r}
POV2_15 <- POV_15 %>%
  
  select(-Persistent.Poverty.1989.1999.2015, 
         -Population_poverty_1989, 
         -Population_poverty_1999, 
         -Poverty_rate_1989, 
         -Poverty_rate_1999, 
         -Location_Type) %>% 
  
  slice(-c(1:51)) %>% 
  
  rename(County = AREA, 
         Total_POV15 = X2015_SAIPE_Poverty, 
         Total_POVpercent15 = Poverty_Rate_2015)
  

  
POV2_15
